description: This image captures a telescope projecting the image of a solar eclipse onto a white sheet of paper. The telescope is mounted on a tripod and is positioned outdoors, with a stone wall serving as the backdrop. The eclipse is shown in a crescent phase, beautifully detailed against the stark white of the paper. The setup suggests a scientific or educational purpose, possibly for safe viewing or photography of the celestial event.
poem:
A telescope on a sunny day,
Catches the moon as it passes the way.
A crescent so fine, on paper it lay,
A moment in cosmos, held in sway.
Science and wonder in perfect array.
